org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor

Class MinMaxStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.MinMaxStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, NormalizerStrategy<MinMaxStats>

    public class MinMaxStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements NormalizerStrategy<MinMaxStats>, java.io.Serializable
    NormalizerStrategy implementation that will normalize and denormalize data arrays to a given range, based on statistics of the upper and lower bounds of the population
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
